general: Available Help Records: go, enter, look, pick up, open, close, lock, unlock, inventory[inv],
go: Format: 'go [direction]' - moves you in the direction indicated.  You can also use 'enter'.
enter: Similar to the 'go' command, use 'help go' for more information.
look: Format: 'look [direction or object]' - this action provides additional information regarding a neighboring space, or specific object in the room
